law.catch_line: On receiving an application for a certificate of title, the Administration shall check the vehicle i...
law.text:
On receiving an application for a certificate of title, the Administration shall check the vehicle identification number shown in the application for the vehicle:
Against the records of vehicles required to be kept by § 13-106 of this subtitle; and
Against the records of stolen vehicles required to be kept by § 14-105 of this article.
